name: 戏装 Chinese Opera Costumes
description:
戏装 Chinese Opera Costumes

[Eng version below]

一个用于添加人物装扮的Lora，目前仅有女旦和小生角色，后续其他装扮陆续添加中，慢慢更新吧……

得益于小人书的多人场景能力，两者混用的画会带来奇特的故事场景能力。但是由于戏曲类手势身段多有变形，手指问题基本不可救药了……

但同时，这个LORA可以作为低权重的人物装束补充，效果比单用好很多，请见例图1、2、3，使用了芳菲作为主LORA

推荐分辨率：512*768（hires required）

推荐模型：AOM3\ChilloutMIX （其实理论上其他的也行，没空测了……）

推荐设置：CFG 5 | 权重 0.75 | DDIM step25 | hires SwinIR 4x step 10 denoising 0.4

例图中多人场景是搭配小人书2.0的效果，权重比为0.75:0.5（小人书0.5）

A Lora for adding character costumes, currently only the role of female HuaDan and male XiaoSheng, followed by other costumes are added one after another, slowly update it ......

Thanks to the multiplayer scene ability of xiaorenshu, the painting of the two mixed will bring a strange story scene ability. But because of the opera class gesture body more deformation, finger problems basically irredeemable ......

But at the same time, this LORA can be used as a low-weight character attire supplement, the effect is much better than the single use, please see examples of Figure 1, 2, 3, the main LORA is flowergirl.

Recommended resolution: 512*768 (hires required)

Recommended models: AOM3\ChilloutMIX (in fact, theoretically the others are fine, no time to test ......)

Recommended settings: CFG 5 | weights 0.75 | DDIM step25 | hires SwinIR 4x step 10 denoising 0.4

The multiplayer scene in the example is with the effect of xiaorenshu 2.0, the weight ratio of 0.75:0.5 (xiaorenshu=0.5)

modelVersions.name: v1.5
modelVersions.description:
加入了小生的形象，但是在一些没什么男人的底模上会看到不可避免的男女装混淆，这个真的救不了……

然后由于小生分走了一些花旦的权重，整体lora的权重需要比较高才能很好的起作用了，触发词现在是必须的。

Adding the images of Xiaosheng, but for some girl-only base models, there will inevitably be confusion between male and female clothing. This cannot be helped...

As Xiaosheng takes away some of the weight of huadan, Lora's overall weight needs to be relatively high to function well. Trigger words are now necessary.
